captions.text: My life is a race against time. Weekends in GP, training all week and always the same goal: Don't miss any details.
Becoming the Champion is the goal all would like to reach.
I already experienced this unique sensation. But each time I ride my bike it's to get to know it again.
In my sport you need to know riding in all conditions on every road. Improvise. Take a risk.
And some people say that I am one of the best in this game. I am Johnny Aubert.
I have travelled around the world for my sport. I've been to Europe, South Africa and lived in the US.
I hope for the future that my experiences will give me serenity.
Riding is the perfect mix between physical and intellectual capacities. I have always thought this and my motivation has never changed.
I am a KTM rider. We have the best bikes, the best mechanics and the highest ambitions.

title: Johnny Aubert preparing to race - The Road to Dakar
